description.value:
Requirements You have both hands free.

Your instincts sing of spite and malice, and you've learned a devastating trick: go for the eyes. You make a claw Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} for 1 round. On a critical hit, the target is instead @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} for 1 round and dazzled until restored to maximum hit points.
